root.name: Action Soccer
root.description: Action Soccer is a soccer game developed by Ludi Media and was published by Ubi Soft in 1995.The game had a very cartoon-style to it that was most noticeable in title screens, pictures and names of the 16 teams that included The Nagging Horses and The Dancing Dolphins. The game could be played in 2D or in isometric 3D and included modes such as:EXHIBITION MATCHUBI CUPUBI CHAMPIONSHIPTOURNAMENTThe game also included British football commentator for the BBC Jonathan Pearce. Known for being very loud and enthusiastic he provided Funny comments during the game that fit the style of the game.
